00027 using std::map;
00028 using std::string;

00032 /*
00033  * Open some log files and write some static initializations stuff.
00034  */
00035 void SimTracer::initialize(int stage)
00036 {
00037   cSimpleModule::initialize(stage);
00038   if (stage == 0) {
00039   char treeName[250];
00040   /*int n;
00041   n =*/ sprintf(treeName, "results/tree-%d.txt",
00042   cSimulation::getActiveSimulation()->getEnvir()->getConfigEx()->getActiveRunNumber());
00043     treeFile.open(treeName);
00044     if (!treeFile) {
00045       EV << "Error opening output stream for routing tree statistics."
00046           << endl;
00047     } else {
00048       treeFile << "graph aRoutingTree " << endl << "{" << endl;
00049     }
00050     goodputVec.setName("goodput");
00051     pSinkVec.setName("sinkPowerConsumption");
00052     pSensorVec.setName("sensorPowerConsumption");
00053     nbApplPacketsSent = 0;
00054     nbApplPacketsReceived = 0;
00055 
00056     // retrieve pointer to BaseWorldUtility module
00057     world = FindModule<BaseWorldUtility*>::findGlobalModule();
00058     //world = check_and_cast<BaseWorldUtility*>(cSimulation::getActiveSimulation()->getModuleByPath("sim.world"));
00059     if (world) {
00060         world->subscribe(BaseLayer::catPacketSignal, this);
00061     }
00062     else {
00063       error("No BaseWorldUtility module found, please check your ned configuration.");
00064     }
00065 
00066 //  } else if(stage == 1) {  // it seems that we are initialized only once. Why ?
00067   }
00068 }
00069 
00070 // compute current average sensor power consumption
00071 double SimTracer::getAvgSensorPowerConsumption() const {
00072   double sensorAvgP = 0;
00073   int    nbSensors  = 0;
00074 
00075   map < unsigned long, double >::const_iterator iter = powerConsumptions.begin(); // address, powerConsumption
00076   for (; iter != powerConsumptions.end(); ++iter) { // iterate over all nodes power consumptions
00077     if(iter->first == 0)
00078       continue;
00079 
00080     double eval = iter->second;
00081     eval = eval +  SIMTIME_DBL(simTime() - lastUpdates.at(iter->first)) * currPower.at(iter->first);
00082     eval = eval * 1000 / SIMTIME_DBL(simTime());
00083 
00084     ++nbSensors;
00085     sensorAvgP += eval;
00086   }
00087   if (nbSensors) {
00088     sensorAvgP = sensorAvgP / nbSensors;
00089   }
00090   return sensorAvgP;
00091 }
00092 
00093 double SimTracer::getSinkPowerConsumption() const {
00094   map < unsigned long, double >::const_iterator iter = powerConsumptions.find(0);
00095   if (iter == powerConsumptions.end())
00096     return 0.0;
00097   double  sinkP = iter->second;
00098   sinkP = sinkP + SIMTIME_DBL(simTime() - lastUpdates.at(iter->first)) * currPower.at(iter->first);
00099   sinkP = sinkP * 1000 / SIMTIME_DBL(simTime());
00100   return sinkP;
00101 }
00102 
00103 /*
00104  * Close the nam log file.
00105  */
00106 void SimTracer::finish()
00107 {
00108   double goodput = 0;
00109   if(nbApplPacketsSent > 0) {
00110     goodput = ((double) nbApplPacketsReceived)/nbApplPacketsSent;
00111   } else {
00112     goodput = 0;
00113   }
00114   recordScalar("Application Packet Success Rate", goodput);
00115   recordScalar("Application packets received", nbApplPacketsReceived);
00116   recordScalar("Application packets sent", nbApplPacketsSent);
00117   recordScalar("Sink power consumption", getSinkPowerConsumption());
00118   recordScalar("Sensor average power consumption", getAvgSensorPowerConsumption());
00119   if (treeFile) {
00120     treeFile << "}" << endl;
00121     treeFile.close();
00122   }
00123 
00124 }

00135 void SimTracer::radioEnergyLog(unsigned long mac, int /*state*/,
00136              simtime_t_cref duration, double power, double newPower)
00137 {
00138   Enter_Method_Silent();
00139   /*
00140   radioEnergyFile << mac << "\t" << state << "\t" << duration << "\t" << power
00141     << endl;
00142     */
00143   if (powerConsumptions.count(mac) == 0) {
00144     powerConsumptions[mac] = 0;
00145   }
00146   powerConsumptions[mac] = powerConsumptions[mac] + power * SIMTIME_DBL(duration);
00147   currPower[mac] = newPower;
00148   lastUpdates[mac] = simTime();
00149   if(mac != 0) {
00150     pSensorVec.record(getAvgSensorPowerConsumption());
00151   } else {
00152     pSinkVec.record(getSinkPowerConsumption());
00153   }
00154 }
00155 
00156 void SimTracer::logPosition(int node, double x, double y, double /*z*/)
00157 {
00158   treeFile << node << "[pos=\""<< x << ", " << y << "!\"];" << endl;
00159 }
00160 
00161 void SimTracer::receiveSignal(cComponent */*source*/, simsignal_t signalID, cObject *obj)
00162 {
00163   if (signalID == BaseLayer::catPacketSignal) {
00164     packet = *(static_cast<const Packet*>(obj));
00165   //  nbApplPacketsSent = nbApplPacketsSent + packet.getNbPacketsSent();
00166   //  nbApplPacketsReceived = nbApplPacketsReceived + packet.getNbPacketsReceived();
00167     if(packet.isSent()) {
00168       nbApplPacketsSent = nbApplPacketsSent + 1;
00169     } else {
00170       nbApplPacketsReceived = nbApplPacketsReceived + 1;
00171     }
00172     goodputVec.record(((double) nbApplPacketsReceived)/nbApplPacketsSent);
00173   }
00174 }
